episodes.title: Daniella Young Scholar of cults, extreme groups and bad leadership.
episodes.description:
Daniella Mestyanek Young is a cult survivor, U.S. Army veteran, Harvard-trained organizational psychologist, and the author of two books about high-control groups. Uncultured, her critically-acclaimed memoir, and The Culting of America, coming January 20 th , 2026, and available for presale at Knitting Cult Lady.

Born into the Children of God—the infamous sex cult known for weaponizing religion, sexuality, and isolation—Daniella escaped at fifteen, only to join another high-control institution: the United States Army.
